TestVector
It tests the Vector class.
ThreadPool<T>
This class is handling a thread pool.
ThreadPool.ParamGetter<T>
The ParamGetter<T> should be implemented in order to give the thread pool's threads a parameter when they start a new job.
ThreadPool.Runnable<T>
The Runnable<T> should be implemented in order the thread pool's threads to run with a given parameter.
Triangle
A triangle is a polygon with three vertices
Tube
A tube is a cylinder with a circular cross section
Util
Util class is used for some internal utilities, e.g. controlling accuracy
Vector
A vector is a point with an additional attribute, a direction
